thread.title: Rawlings Doesnt Boom At Home Zanetor
thread.title_full: Rawlings Doesnt Boom At Home Zanetor

title: Rawlings Doesnt Boom At Home Zanetor
text:
Politics | 13 October 2015 12:11 CET Rawlings Doesn’t ‘Boom’ At Home – Zanetor Source: Starrfmonline.com 
Former President Jerry Rawlings and his daughter Zanetor Rawlings 
Dr Zanetor Rawlings, daughter of former President Jerry John Rawlings has revealed that her father does not show anger at home like he does in the public when reacting to issues. 
According to her, the former military leader has a great sense of humor which is not known to many Ghanaians. 
Former President Rawlings is widely known for his public outbursts against issues he considers as morally wrong. He has been nicknamed “Dr Boom” for his expletives against politicians who he perceives to be corrupting the morale fibre of society. 
But commenting on his demeanor at home, his daughter who flew a military jet at age 13, told Fiifi Banson on Kasapa FM Tuesday that her father is an entirely different person when dealing with his family. 
When asked by Banson if her father “booms at home”, Rawlings responded “ he does not, at least not to anyone I know”. 
She also praised the marital relationship that has existed between her mother ,Konadu Agyemang Rawlings and the former President over the years, describing them as a “good team”. Politics Follow Us Robbing Peter to pay Paul is bad but robbing for the sake of robbing is even worse. By: Osei, Worms Am Rhe
